QuestData.Title: Young Lovers
QuestData.Description: Oh, I'm cursed! My heart belongs to Tommy Joe Stonefield, but our families are bitter enemies. So I can't see him, even though my eyes ache to gaze upon that handsome face!$B$BPlease, take this letter and give it to Tommy Joe. He's usually at the river to the west of the Stonefield Farm, which is due west of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Give Maybell's Love Letter to Tommy Joe Stonefield.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have what?? Maybell is the light of my dull life. Hurry, let me see her letter!
QuestData.RewardText: Ah! I can't stand us being apart. I have to see her!!
